courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: ECON 502, or equivalent. MSPE Graduate Student Standing.
description: Develops a general methodological basis for searching for quantitative economic knowledge; integrates and gives operational content to the topics of economic, statistical, and econometric theory. Prerequisite: ECON 502, or equivalent. MSPE Graduate Student Standing.
label: Econometrics
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign. Restricted to MS:Economics:Policy Econ -UIUC.
